module.title: Sales Management
module.description: Quotes, orders, fulfillment, invoicing, and payments connected to the product catalog.

send.title: Send quote to customer
send.missingEmail: Customer email is required to send a quote.

public.expiredMessage: Please contact the seller to request an updated quote.

accept.invalidStatus: This quote cannot be accepted in its current status.

adminEmail.heading: Quote {quoteNumber} accepted
adminEmail.body: The customer accepted quote {quoteNumber}. An order has been created: {orderNumber}.

table.name: Name
table.subtitle: Organize catalog offers per marketplace or storefront.

offers.listSubtitle: Review product overrides across every sales channel.
offers.heading: Offers for {{name}}
offers.subtitle: Override product presentation and pricing per channel.

errors.duplicateProduct: This product already has an offer in this channel.
errors.priceKindRequired: Select a price kind for each price override.
errors.priceKindDuplicate: Each price kind can only be overridden once.

table.empty: No offers for this channel yet.

pricing.help: Provide overrides for price kinds when this offer is active.

dialog.colorHelp: Pick a highlight color for this status.
dialog.iconPlaceholder: Type an emoji or pick one of the suggestions.

adjustmentKinds.title: Adjustment kinds
adjustmentKinds.description: Manage reusable adjustment kinds for taxes, surcharges, shipping, and discounts.

dialog.createDescription: Define a reusable adjustment kind shown in document adjustment dialogs.
dialog.editDescription: Update the code, label, or appearance for this adjustment kind.

shippingMethods.title: Shipping methods
shippingMethods.description: Manage carriers, providers, and default shipping prices.

form.name: Name
form.selectProvider: Choose a provider to configure settings.

paymentMethods.title: Payment methods
paymentMethods.description: Configure payment providers and any checkout fees.

form.name: Name
form.selectProvider: Choose a provider to configure settings.

orderEditing.title: Order editing guards
orderEditing.description: Control when customers and addresses can be changed on an order.
orderEditing.pickStatuses: Select statuses that allow this change
orderEditing.note: Changing the customer clears assigned addresses to avoid mixing contact data.

errors.load: Failed to load order editing settings.
errors.save: Failed to save order editing settings.

taxRates.title: Tax rates
taxRates.description: Maintain VAT classes applied to catalog pricing.

form.name: Name
form.isDefaultHelp: Preselect this class for new catalog products.

numbering.title: Document numbers
numbering.description: Control numbering for sales orders and quotes.
numbering.sequenceHint: Applied on the next generated number for this type.
numbering.sequenceHintQuote: Resets the quote counter for the next document.
numbering.tokensHint: Combine tokens to shape your identifiers, e.g. ORDER/{yyyy}/{seq:5}.

errors.forbidden: You do not have access to generate numbers.

list.subtitle: Review documents with customer context, totals, and channels.
